reviews.review: exelente historia, un gran juego de puzzle estresante

Play the first game. Play this game.

Excellent writing, fun puzzles that are accessible without really being easy. It's funny, it's weird, it's great.

The co-op is also one of my favorite ways to play games with others. How can you go wrong with Portal?

An essential, must-play game for everyone. Please play it if you haven't.

*Falls into a portal, and flies out of a diagonal one*
weee
Muy bueno para jugar en equipo, un clasico, sin lugar a dudas, buen juego de puzzles

Very great game, for the last week this is the only game i've been playing nonstop, i havent showered in a week and i havent eaten anything, as well as i havent drank anything, only piss and poop. i love this game, i actually feel like the whole my world is one big portal game, nonstop portals and nonstop levels. i feel like im rolling down in the deep while playing this game. its like when my brain gets numb, and sometimes you could call it a mental freeze.

This is easily one of the cleverest, funniest and most satisfying games I've ever played.

And it keeps on giving, especially when you think it's all over.

This game is a good challenge and is also very fun, its a well balanced game with some hilarious comedy

Honestly, to date this is my favourite game. It's a puzzle game basically, the game-play is amazing and the story line is cinematic and cute. Has a two-player online mode also. I want a portal 3 to be released :(
uno de los mejores juegos que e jugado en mi corta vida, el final me encanto❤❤

The FitnessGram™ Pacer Test is a multistage aerobic capacity test that progressively gets more difficult as it continues. The 20 meter pacer test will begin in 30 seconds. Line up at the start. The running speed starts slowly, but gets faster each minute after you hear this signal. [beep] A single lap should be completed each time you hear this sound. [ding] Remember to run in a straight line, and run as long as possible. The second time you fail to complete a lap before the sound, your test is over. The test will begin on the word start. On your mark, get ready, start.

Test, test, test. Who does not like to test ?

The greatest game of all time. Even in 2021 the graphics look very good. If I can only play one game for the rest of my life, portal 2 will definitely be it.
its fun it also has a good story
very good. new people advise, git gud

No entiendo ni cómo, pero se ha convertido en uno de mis juegos favoritos. Los diálogos, la temática, la historia, la jugabilidad e incluso su música son geniales. No le encuentro un "pero" a este juego. Ojalá hagan uno de los orígenes de Aperture Science 😍
Best 3d platformer game. If only if had open world and quest. I am kidding okay.
dis good game buy it of i kill you now

Portal 2 — неотделимый от первой части эксперимент. Это в прямом смысле головоломка для всех. 

Действие же самой игры происходит спустя некоторое время после событий первой части Portal в разрушенной и заброшенной Лаборатории, откуда и начинается сама игра.

Portal 2 - это отличная история, безупречный стиль и максимально нетипичная концепция. Также это одна из лучших игр для коопа, который имеет свои уровни. Даа… Помню как еще много лет назад проходил Portal 2 с братом на стареньком xbox’е 

Вне всяких сомнений игра обязательна к ознакомлению! Да, что тут скрывать - это БАЗА. База в мире головоломок. 

И да, как жаль, что valve не умеет считать до трех….

don't get if braindead. like me. so many youtube walk throughs watched, they're engraved in my brain

10/10 would break the laws of physics again

Сначала я купил эту игру чтобы просто узнать сюжет, но он тут не простой... он восхитителен! я буду её перепроходить ещё очень много раз. Советую к покупке всем, даже тем кто не любит головоломки. 
И ещё, первая часть не стоит своих денег, по своему желанию можете купить и её, но я бы не рекомендовал. У неё очень короткий сюжет. Лучше посмотрите на ютубе прохождение и не парьтесь.
Very nice and interesting game. I recommend it!

Did an entire 2 player play through of this game with my GF. We loved it. Both of us had a bunch of fun solving the puzzles thrown at us. Puzzles that I could not solve came easy to her, puzzles that she couldn't solve came easy to me - with the odd brain twister thrown in there that takes a while to figure out. Would highly recommend this game to anyone who has a significant other or a good friend to play it with.
Poooooortallll!!!! Best game ever created in the whole history of humanity
